explains: v. 引起，激起；叫醒，唤醒；激起……的性欲
wordGroup: arouse the enthusiasm of 调动积极性
arouse from v. 从…中唤醒

sentences.en: They arouse the interest of all the readers.
sentences.cn: 它们引起了所有读者的兴趣。

sentences.en: Silly mistakes and queer clothes often arouse ridicule.
sentences.cn: 荒谬的错误和古怪的服装常引起讪笑。

sentences.en: You're trying to arouse certain responses by implanting certain cues.
sentences.cn: 你试图通过植入特定的线索来引起特定的反应。
